Posted By: True_Mumin (10/29/2009 6:41:46 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Just remember that with cards like [Sleep](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sleep) and other blue manipulation, it doesn't need big creature to get the job done. Making this card unblockable or just throwing down a [Soaring Seacliff](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soaring Seacliff) suddenly make this guy a threat, especially if you have some counter spells in had to counter act anything your opponent might throw down on this guy. Blue isn't often blessed with big creatures(yes, even [Vizzerdrix](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vizzerdrix) carries its weight when equipped with [Steel of the Godhead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Steel of the Godhead)), especially ones like [Sphinx of Jwar Isle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sphinx of Jwar Isle) or [Goliath Sphinx](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goliath Sphinx).
posts.html:
Just remember that with cards like Sleep and other blue manipulation, it doesn't need big creature to get the job done. Making this card unblockable or just throwing down a Soaring Seacliff suddenly make this guy a threat, especially if you have some counter spells in had to counter act anything your opponent might throw down on this guy. Blue isn't often blessed with big creatures(yes, even Vizzerdrix carries its weight when equipped with Steel of the Godhead), especially ones like Sphinx of Jwar Isle or Goliath Sphinx.

Posted By: evenblackerlotus (10/5/2009 11:10:33 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Now I'll usually argue, most bad cards are funny and have their uses if you really try, at least casually.  
  
But this guy was a waste of a common, and I'm getting tired of seeing magic just not try on commons. Defender should be, AT LEAST, -1 CC, not +1, no matter how easy it is to get rid of. Blue isn't much for fatties, no, and to show this it likes to give them huge drawbacks, but this just isn't funny. Give it Islandwalk, and MAYBE. MAYBE. But this? No. Not even worth running with Ula's Temple.
posts.html:
